featured.text: Dr. Chu’s speech on the new energy source attracted great _____ from the audience at the conference.
At City Hall, Mayor Abraham Beame hosted a news conference that turned into a ceremony in George Willig's honor.
Each member must register for the conference .

definition.zh_def: 會議，一群人聚集在一起討論特定主題的正式場合。
definition.en_def: A formal meeting for discussion, typically involving a group of people focused on a specific topic.
definition.example: The annual conference will be held in New York this year.
